sentences.en: Greedy beggars !'he observed , making for the provender.'Why did not you invite me, Ratty?
sentences.cn: “贪吃的花子们! ” 他朝食物凑拢去, “鼠兄,怎不邀请我呀? ”

sentences.en: If others are the machines to provide provender, they are the machines to read it.
sentences.cn: 如果说别人是供给此种食物的机器, 他们就是过屠门而大嚼的阅读机器.

sentences.en: It is a proud horse that will bear his own provender.
sentences.cn: 再高傲的马也得自己驮草料。

sentences.en: It is a proud horse that will not bear his own provender.
sentences.cn: 再高傲的马也得自己驮草料.

sentences.en: She said moreover unto him , We have and provender enough and room to lodge in.
sentences.cn: 25又说: 我们家里足有粮草,也有住宿的地方.

sentences.en: The ambrosial and essential part of the fruit is lost with the bloom which is rubbed off in the market cart , and they become mere provender.
sentences.cn: 水果的美味和它那本质的部分，在装上了车子运往市场去的时候，跟它的鲜丽一起给磨损了，它变成了仅仅是食品。
